name: Lawyers' Committee for Civil Rights of the San Francisco Bay Area
description: As one of the oldest civil rights institutions on the West Coast, we work to dismantle systems of oppression and racism, and build an equitable and just society. Services include: - LCCRSF Walk-in Clinic - Rapid Response Community Resources - Legal Services for Entrepreneurs
fullDescription: As one of the oldest civil rights institutions on the West Coast, we work to dismantle systems of oppression and racism, and build an equitable and just society. Services include: - LCCRSF Walk-in Clinic - Rapid Response Community Resources - Legal Services for Entrepreneurs

address: 131 Steuart Street, Suite 400, San Francisco, CA, 94105
